item.title: Greetings from the Rhône Glacier, where a gash of pink highlights how it's melting
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Study: We're losing the war against drug-resistant infections faster than we thought
item.description: Antimicrobial resistance is responsible for some 1.2 million deaths a year a year and contributes to millions more. Data in the new report shows that ...

item.title: A Supreme Court ruling on voting rights could boost Republicans' redistricting efforts
item.description: A Supreme Court case over Louisiana's congressional map could determine the future of Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination and ...

item.title: Raila Odinga, Kenya's former Prime Minister, dies at 80
item.description: Raila Odinga — the towering figure of Kenyan politics who helped usher in multiparty democracy and a new constitution — has died in India at 80.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire deal tested. And, Supreme Court hears case questioning voting rights
